briefTitle: Bone Mineral Density Effects of Zoledronate in Postmenopausal Women With Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Bone Mineral Density Effects of Zoledronate in Postmenopausal Women With Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in Bone Mineral Density (BMD) From Baseline to 1 Year
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Postmenopausal women, Stage III or axillary node positive
* Currently disease free of breast cancer and other invasive malignancies at the time of registration
* No concurrent use of bisphosphonates

Exclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic disease
